title: People Like Us
description: Generations of Americans have struggled against segregation. Most of us believe in the ideal of a colorblind society. But what happens when that ideal come up against research that finds colorblindness sometimes leads to worse outcomes?
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
